channel.title: Posts on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Linux know how, that must be known by SREs
item.description: Was your Mac rebooted recently? > uptime The response also shows whether CPU utilization is increasing recently: 6:35 up 9 days, 11:56, 7 users, load averages: 2.09 2.24 2.06 “load averages” numbers are calculations of the average system load over three periods of times: the last one-, five-, and fifteen-minute periods. These count the number of processes either using or waiting for CPU (the ready queue or run queue) increments the load number by 1.

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide is the templated version
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme. This is a link

item.title: Math Typesetting

item.title: Emoji Support
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways.
